CustomField.description: Used to translate old sales org names to new ones without messing with sales org code
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Sales_Division_Override__c)<>"", TEXT(Sales_Division_Override__c), IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PAY"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES CORE"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "HICKS") || CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "ROBERTSON") || CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "MANGIAVELLANO")|| CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "CLARK")|| CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "LOUVAIN")|| CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "278")|| CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "STANGIS")), 'Virtual SMB Inbound', IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PAY"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"SMB Virtual Channel")), 'SMB Virtual Channel', IF( AND ( CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES REP - DISTRICT 214-DIVINCENZO (HRD")), 'Virtual Merchant Services', IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PAY"), OR(CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"HYBRID DEDICATED"),CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL DEDICATED"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"SMB New Business"))),'SMB New Business', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "HNBF"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "Virtual Sales")|| CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "VIRTUAL SALES")), 'Virtual HNBF', IF(ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "TAA"), "Virtual TAA", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "HNBF"), NOT(CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL"))), 'Field HNBF', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PC"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES")), 'Virtual PC', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "ESR"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES")), 'Virtual ESR', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PBA"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES")), 'Virtual PBA', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "MS"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES")), 'Virtual Merchant Services', IF( AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "BusDev"),ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PAY")), OR ( BEGINS(UserRole.Name,"Bank Centric"), (BEGINS(UserRole.Name, "Bank Channel")))), 'Bank Channel', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PAS"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"MMS")), 'RSR', IF( AND ( CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"NSC")), 'NSC', IF ( AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "BusDev"),ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "PAY")), OR ( CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"Sales Account Manager"), (CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "Strategic Accounts")) ) ) , 'Strategic Accounts', IF(TEXT(Sales_Org__c) = 'PAY', 'SMB Channel', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Org__c, "MMS"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "CSR")), 'CSSR', IF(AND(TEXT(Sales_Org__c) = 'MMS', CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, 'SALES DEVELOPMENT')), 'MMS SDR', IF(AND(TEXT(Sales_Org__c) = 'MMS', NOT(CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, 'SALES DEVELOPMENT'))), 'Field MMS', IF( AND ( CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,"NSS Outbound Rep 1.6 - Client ITB Hybrid")), 'Agency NSS', IF(TEXT(Sales_Org__c) = 'PAS', 'ASO', IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c, "HRS"), CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "288") || CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "289") || CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "290")|| CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "291")|| CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "292") || CONTAINS(UserRole.Name, "293")), 'Virtual Retirement', TEXT(Sales_Org__c) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ))))))
CustomField.label: Sales Division
